sourcesContent:
<script>
import { mapState } from 'vuex';
import viewList from './components/viewList.vue';
import createList from './components/createList.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    viewList,
    createList
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(['users']), // Использование mapState для получения состояния users
  },
  methods: {
    addNewUser(payload) {
      console.log('3. received in parent', payload);
      this.$store.dispatch('addNewUser', payload);
      console.log('4. sent to store');
    }
  }
};
</script>

<template>
  <viewList 
 />
  <createList
  @addNewUser = 'addNewUser'/>
</template>


<style> 
  
</style>
